name: Weblink Backup
summary: A YRCBCK file is a backup file created by YRC Group Weblink, a web browser for Windows. It contains a copy of a user's history, bookmark archive files ( .YRCBKM files), saved form information, and settings. Weblink users can load a YRCBCK file to import their data into another instance of Weblink.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: YRCBCK file open in YRC Group Weblink
